answers.answer: It might not. I had preeclamplsia with my first and had a csection because bp was 170/140 after 7wks of bp meds and I was too ill for an induction. This time I have preeclamplsia again, developed at 15wks and just starting to now not respond to bp meds at 30wks and they'll do another csection because I'm too ill again and vaginal delivery will increase bp when its already dangerously high. But if your bp is only slightly above 140/90 and not too much protein that might allow you. Wishing you lots of luck!

You actually don't have to have preeclampsia to have high blood pressure.  I was recently diagnosed with gestational hypertension I was 35 weeks at the time and they are planning to take baby at 37 but my doctor did say there was a possibility of developing preeclampsia the further along I went. All they did is put me on bed rest.

I'M dealing with preeclampsia I'M 34 wks n I will delivering my Bby girl at 37 wks n we r going for a vaginal just Lk my first but there is always that risk that my bp can go up so Whatever is safe for me n Bby! But I believe u can do what u want as ur delivery goes unless it gets bad..  but good luck!  :)
I had my bp high the other day the dr said presure increases as you go further in pregnancy nothing to worry but go and check with your doctor better sure then sorry :-)

I'm 27 weeks and on bed rest for my blood pressure. Having a hard time keeping it in the normal range even laying here all the time. Protein in urine is up too. Good luck and definitely keep track of your pressure and let your doctor know.

question: So im 31 weeks today I've been nagging terrible headaches, hot flashes like to the point I have to sit down and feel like passing out etc. I took my bp earlier and it was 140/78 my bp normally runs 116/68. Husband took me to the squad bay to have them double check and there they got 142/76. Bottom number not so bad or to high for me but very glad I have a doctor's appt on Monday. Fearful im developing preeclampsia which could definitely ruin my vbac plans. But in the end either way ik I will have to do what id safest for us.
title: a bit stressed after checking my bp
